name: src/bottom.js
RedisBottom
description: Excatly what you expect: persist your json with redis.

name: LocalStorageBottom
description: Excatly what you expect: persist your json in html5 LocalStorage.

name: src/bucket.js
pluralize
description: Appends a 's' to the given string.

name: modelNameFromId
description: Resolves the modelName from in _id (persistence id).

name: Bucket
description:
Buckets are used to create your overall pile.
Use them to cluster your objects together.

Buckets store data in a flat manner.

name: register
description:
Registers a cls for this Bucket.

This means that the Bucket is able to persist those objects
into his own Namespace as seperate objects.

name: get
description:
Asynchronous getter for mediators known by the Bucket.

Error are handled in the callback method, that *must* be
provided if you want to receive a result.

name: add
description: Adds one or more mediators to the Bucket.

name: _add
description: Adds one object to the Bucket.

name: remove
description:
Removes one or more objects from the Bucket.

You can pass an id or an mediator or a list of both, mediators
and ids to this method.

name: _remove
description: Removes one object from the bucket, either by id or mediator object.

name: Junction
description:
Those were managed behind the scene by a Bucket.
For each junction between two Meditors there
will be a Junction available.

name: src/dumpster_diver.js
DumpsterDiver
description: Find stuff in one or more Buckets.

name: src/mediator.js
clone
description: Clones an object with stringify to JSON and returning the parsed result.

name: Mediator
description: Mediators know how to persist their data into JSON.

name: constructor
description:
Mediators eat a data Object on construction.
They have the following data by default:

name: _get
description: Getter method that is aware references.

name: _set
description:
Setter method for instance properties that are encapsulated in _data.
The setter tracks references in the seperate map _refs.

params.name: prop
params.description: The name of the property to set.

params.name: value
params.description: The new value for the given prop.

name: toJSON
description: Returns the underlying data object as json string.

unknown.tagValue: {string} This object as a JSON string.

return.description: This object as a JSON string.
